ing: 1/2 cup apple juice, or more if needed
des: "My family loves this recipe on hot summer days. My friends also request these when we have our annual Fourth of July parties, and sometimes during Halloween parties. This is how we like them, but play around with it and make it your own! I hope you enjoy them as much as we do!"
ins: Blend apple, apple juice, ice cream, butter, sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a blender until smooth.
